headline: What Caterpillar (CAT)'s $825 Million Manufacturing and Workforce Investment Means For Shareholders
summary: Caterpillar Inc. recently announced a major US$725 million capital expansion at its Lafayette, Indiana engine facility, alongside the launch of a five-year, US$100 million workforce pledge, with Indiana receiving up to US$5 million for training initiatives. This dual investment aims to boost advanced manufacturing capacity and talent development, reinforcing Caterpillar's response to energy demand and fostering innovation for future industry growth. We'll now examine how this large-scale...

headline: Microsoft, Meta Set To Report Earnings As Investors Watch Out For Trump-Xi, Fed Meeting
summary: This week will witness earnings releases from the Magnificent 7 stocks. Investors will await news from Trump-Xi meeting. Read here for more details.
